description: Upgrades a published schema under a new minor version revision using the current contents of DevelopmentSchemaArn.

parameters.name: DevelopmentSchemaArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the development schema with the changes used for the upgrade.

parameters.name: PublishedSchemaArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the published schema to be upgraded.

parameters.name: MinorVersion
parameters.description: Identifies the minor version of the published schema that will be created. This parameter is NOT optional.

nested_items.name: UpgradedSchemaArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the upgraded schema that is returned as part of the response.
